description: Listed only by Irwin, who says: �A Flute of 16' manual pitch similar to the Lieblichgedeckt or Echo Gedeckt in tone and volume. It is seen on the Choir or Swell of a few organs.�
examplesDescription: Sanftbass 16', Pedal; Hans Sachs Haus, Gelsenkirchen, Germany; Walcker 1927.
